name: Dernick
description: Captain DernickOccupationPurpose??AppearanceGenderMaleEye color??Hair color??Equipment and techAffiliationSSRCaptain Dernickwas a senior officer, along withRaeder, ofSupersymmetric Research's security team on theDatamineartificial island construct.

name: Erased
description: She was severely injured during a battle againstE Pluribus Neooperatives, which caused severe trauma and had to have her RSI reset. Because of this, she has developed a severe hatred of all the members of that organization that wounded her, demanding vengeance no matter the cost. Another change in her behavior was that she is desperate to regain her role in the Cypherites.

name: Neurophyte
description: Neurophytewas a crew member of theNovalis IIduring the events ofThe Matrix Online. Before the merging of the eight servers into three, there was a mission where Neurophyte was infected by a kill-code virus when she was in the Matrix and needed to be saved, which resulted in a different outcome depending on the pre-merged server. With the merge, the admin for the game,Walrusannounced it would drop this storyline.

name: The Architect
description: The Architect was constructed by other Machines to understand the nature of humans. He createdthe very firstMatrixas a utopia for the humans whose minds inhabited it, to keep them subdued so their body heat could be used as energy by the Machines. However, those human minds rejected this first attempt at a perfect world and so thisMatrixcrashed.A second attemptadded "vulgarities" of human nature and a basiccause and effect, but this beta was also a failure.

name: Naidian
description: NaidianAppearancesThe Matrix OnlineNamesReal nameSamantha BishalHacker nameNaidianAppearanceEntityRedpillGenderFemaleNaidianwas a formerRedpillwho was a formerZionitecaptain, who switched to the side of the machines during the firstattack on theZiondock. She has now become a mission contact (or mission liaison) to theMachinistsin theRecursionserver ofthe Matrix Online.

name: Azul
description: AzulAppearancesThe Matrix OnlineNamesReal name???Hacker nameAzulAppearanceEntityRedpillGenderMaleEye color??Hair colorBrownAzulwas a male Redpill who along withCasqueandAndromeda, was one ofAnome'slieutenants who helped Anome with stealing the Cheat vials from Niobe and the Zionites. He then became a member of the renegade group known asUnlimit. It was believed that Azul turned from his organization and joined the fight against them when he killed Genev and Casque.

name: Vairys
description: VairysAppearancesThe Matrix OnlineNamesReal nameWinter MarionHacker nameVairysAppearanceGenderFemaleEye colorYellowHair colorBlondVairys is a female cypherite who is in theRecursionserver ofThe Matrix Online.

name: Tichborne
description: TitchborneAppearancesThe Matrix OnlineNamesReal nameArgyle TichborneHacker nameTitchborneAppearanceEntityRedpillGenderMaleTichbornewas a liaison to theMerovingiansin the Vector server of theThe Matrix Online.

name: Alsos
description: James Keenan was awakened at regulation age before the truce. he witnessed the events of the truce within the walls ofZion. Although he does not yet have enough experience in general, this is all overcompensated by his knowledge of the Real, which is more than most newly awakened Redpills. Despite his short age, he is shown to be highly skilled in communication, which had led him to become an efficient carrier within Zion.

name: Racon
description: RaconAppearancesThe Matrix OnlineNamesReal nameLared GoldingHacker nameRaconAppearanceEntityRedpillGenderMale?Height???Eye color???Hair colorRed/Light Brown?Raconwas aZioniteliaisonaboard theLogos IIin theRecursioninstance ofThe Matrix Online.

name: Al3xandra
description: People keep saying Alex is like my big sister. I don't know why they do, but I trust her more than I trust anyone on this crew. She earns that trust from everyone she meets, it seems.

name: Barakoa
description: BarakoaAppearancesThe Matrix OnlineNamesReal nameVuai ShariffHacker nameBarakoaAppearanceGenderMaleHair color??Barakoawas aCypheritewho served as a crewmember onboard his organization's flagship, TheBlue Dreamer. He was one of the only members to have disappeared prior to the disappearance of the liaison known asViraconrida. Because of this, he was easily eliminated from suspicion.

name: Gemaskeerd
description: GemaskeerdAppearancesThe Matrix OnlineNamesHacker nameGemaskeerdAppearanceEntityRedpillGenderMaleHair color??Gemaskeerdwas a member of theCypherites, who was one of the Cypherite members, along withEnmascaradoof freeing the traitorousToorima, when she betrayed theZionites. He was formerly a crewmember of theHvBRGTerra Nova.

name: Lathana
description: Cynthia was awakened by an overzealous Zion operative, she became bitter in a short period of time. Most likely because of this, she defected to theCypheritesmovement in order to protect the bluepills from the same fate she experienced. She had recently joined theDreami'shovercraft, TheNanshe.

name: Caelifera
description: CaeliferaAppearancesThe Matrix OnlineNamesReal nameAlexis RowlandHacker nameCaeliferaAppearanceGenderFemaleHair colorBlondCaeliferawas aZionitewho served aLiaisoncrewmember aboard theLogos II. She appears only in theRecursioninstance ofThe Matrix Online.

name: Halborn
description: Halborn suddenly appeared inside theMatrixas a glowing wireframe figure and attacks against him proved futile due to his tremendous levels of system access which enabled him to issue override codes; altering the physics of the simulation and seizing control of all software that was active around him. Although theMachinescorrectly identified him to be a freebornhuman, his true nature and motives remain a mystery. He has however become fascinated withZionand the two recurring humans which becam...

attributes.Mission: To aquire the Biological Interface Program

name: Eramastica
description: EramasticaAppearancesThe Matrix OnlineNamesReal nameLouisa PhillipsHacker nameEramasticaAppearanceEntityRedpillGenderFemaleEye color??Hair colorBrownEramasticawas aCypheritewho was a personal operative to the liaison known asItarrot, and who only appears in theSyntaxinstance ofThe Matrix Online. She is known as a smart talker and is more than happy to slay anyone that is in her way of her objectives.

name: John Moira
description: John MoiraAppearanceGenderMaleHair color??Equipment and techAffiliationBrothers of DestinyJohn Moirawas the gang leader of theBrothers of Destinygang, which resides inAkasaka. He is a master of the martial arts, making him one of the most dangerousexilesin theMatrix. His mantra is to act and not be acted upon.

name: Raeder
description: Captain RaederOccupationPurpose??AppearanceGenderMaleEye color??Hair color??Equipment and techAffiliationSSR?Captain Raederwas a senior member ofSupersymmetric Research. It is notable that he was the only individual outside of SSR's upper management to have access to the company's sensitive most information.

name: Roolith
description: RoolithAppearancesThe Matrix OnlineNamesReal nameJohn SteeleHacker nameRoolithAppearanceEntityRedpillGenderMaleHeight???Eye color???Hair color???Roolithwas aliaisonof theE Pluribus Neoorganization aboard the organization's flagship,Neo's Hope. name: Escondido
description: EscondidoAppearancesThe Matrix OnlineNamesReal name??Hacker nameEscondidoAppearanceEntityRedpillGenderMaleHeight??Eye color??Hair colorBrownEscondidowas a member of theCypheritesin theRecursionserver ofThe Matrix Online. During the disappearance of the official liaison,Viraconrida, He, along withFestanevewere met under suspicion, due to the fact he served as the former's replacement during her disappearance. He disappeared several months after the incident.

name: Khepril
description: KheprilAppearancesThe Matrix OnlineNamesHacker nameKheprilAppearanceEntityRedpillGenderMaleHeight???Eye color???Hair colorBrown?Kheprilwas anE Pluribus Neoliaison on theVectorserver ofThe Matrix Onlineand a crewman aboardNeo's Hopeon the same server.

name: Matarax
description: When he returned to the Matrix, it offered him some escape from the real life reality. He met up with a group of members who would later be revealed as theCypherites, who craved being reinserted back to the matrix as well. He even admired and befriended the group's leaders,CryptosandVeil. He has since abandoned separated theZionitesin favor of joining the renegade group, expressing the fact that humans should embrace the co-dependence of theMachines.

name: Stigmatism
description: StigmatismAppearancesThe Matrix OnlineNamesReal nameVincent WolfHacker nameStigmatismAppearanceEntityRedpillGenderMaleHeight???Eye color???Hair colorBlackStigmatismwas aZionitewho worked on theLogos IIand worked as a liaison officer in theSyntaxinstance ofThe Matrix Online. He is said to be interested in the future.

name: TACACS
description: TACACSOccupationPurposeused for secure communicationMachinist liaisonType of ExileHumanAppearanceGenderMaleEquipment and techAffiliationMachinistTACACS(short forTerminal Access Controller Access System) was aliaisonofficer for the Machinists in theSyntaxserver ofThe Matrix Online.

attributes.Purpose: used for secure communication Machinist liaison

name: Zaelti
description: When Zion found and captured the undercover Merovingian crew who had relayed TheOracle'skill-codeto a spy insideZion--apparently someone on the Oracle's security detail. Questioning of one the captured crew, McLelland, helped Zion identify the spy himself--an operative named Zaelti--but the kill-code was not found in his possession.

name: Hatchet
description: HatchetAppearanceGenderMaleHair color???Equipment and techAffiliationCrossbonesHatchetwas the gang leader of theCrossbones, a gang that resided inMoriah Projects. It is unknown what had started the gang war between the gang and theDemon Army, who were led byMammon. However, Hatchet is more than wiling to finish it. Like the rest of the gang, he is a dangerousexile.

name: Acavaria
description: Dani was a orphan at a very young age, and so had very little or no memory of her parents. She had always known that there was something wrong with the world she lived in. When she was finally awakened when she was fourteen, she took her training very seriously. She shunned the simulation for several years and in that time learned what it meant to be human. She, however, returned into theMatrixat the request ofKid.
